channel.title: Bleeders DIEgest
channel.itunes:author: Bloody FM
channel.itunes:subtitle: Original scary stories delivered as a fully immersive theatrical experience. From your speakers, straight into your psyche. Our tales are guaranteed to terrify the bravest of souls (even the dead ones).Curated and written by Trevor and Lauren Shand (B...
channel.itunes:summary:
Original scary stories delivered as a fully immersive theatrical experience. From your speakers, straight into your psyche. Our tales are guaranteed to terrify the bravest of souls (even the dead ones).

Curated and written by Trevor and Lauren Shand (Boo Crew Podcast). Krsy Fox (Filmmaker/Musician FRANK, I Live Alone, Knee High Fox) and Spider One (Powerman 5000). Select episodes will feature horror celebrities such as Bonnie Aarons (The Conjuring 2, The Nun), Adam Busch (Buffy The Vampire Slayer) as guest readers. We dare you to listen!


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
channel.description:
Original scary stories delivered as a fully immersive theatrical experience. From your speakers, straight into your psyche. Our tales are guaranteed to terrify the bravest of souls (even the dead ones).

Curated and written by Trevor and Lauren Shand (Boo Crew Podcast). Krsy Fox (Filmmaker/Musician FRANK, I Live Alone, Knee High Fox) and Spider One (Powerman 5000). Select episodes will feature horror celebrities such as Bonnie Aarons (The Conjuring 2, The Nun), Adam Busch (Buffy The Vampire Slayer) as guest readers. We dare you to listen!


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

item.title: EP#53 - Making Plans
item.itunes:title: EP#53 - Making Plans
item.description:
A group of trick-or-treaters meet up to discuss the big night-before things go horribly wrong. “Making Plans”, written and narrated by Jeremy John is from his new book The Strange Grave of Mikey Dunbar and Other Stories To Make You Poop Your Pants. Available wherever books are sold, from Dundern Press.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

item.title: Bleeders DIEgest Season One Wrap Up Show: Part 2
item.itunes:title: Bleeders DIEgest Season One Wrap Up Show: Part 2
item.description:
Join us for the Bleeders DIEgest Season One Wrap Up Show: Part 2. We talk about concept ideas, guest actors, writing and voice acting and so much more on episodes 14-26. You don't want to miss this episode!! If you are new to Bleeders DIEgest be sure to check out episodes 14-26 before listening. Our new season starts January 20th, 2022!  **Join our official Patreon and support the show! Get ad-free episodes, shout-outs, and more. item.title: Bleeders DIEgest Season One Wrap Up Show: Part 1
item.itunes:title: Bleeders DIEgest Season One Wrap Up Show: Part 1
item.description:
Join us for the Bleeders DIEgest Season One Wrap Up Show: Part 1. We talk about concept ideas, guest actors, writing and voice acting and so much more on episodes 1-13. You don't want to miss this episode!! If you are new to Bleeders DIEgest be sure to check out episodes 1-13 before listening. Our new season starts January 20th 2022! **Join our official Patreon and support the show! Get ad-free episodes, shout-outs, and more. Click the link to join https://www.patreon.com/bleedersdiegest To haunt us on social media click here https://linktr.ee/bleedersdiegest

item.itunes:title: Ep#17 - The Pills (Guest Starring Scout Compton)
item.itunes:subtitle: Bleeders DIEgest kicks off the month of October with special guest actor Scout Compton (Rob Zombie's Halloween). Sam is convinced she is a monster, her therapist begs to differ. The power of suggestion will decide. PLUS on a Bleeders DIEgest post-...
item.description:
Bleeders DIEgest kicks off the month of October with special guest actor Scout Compton (Rob Zombie's Halloween). Sam is convinced she is a monster, her therapist begs to differ. The power of suggestion will decide. PLUS on a Bleeders DIEgest post-show, we talk about the making of the episode, a sneak peek of what's to come and read your reviews! **Join our official Patreon and support the show! item.title: Bleeders DIEgest Trailer
item.itunes:title: Bleeders DIEgest Trailer
item.itunes:subtitle: Original scary stories delivered as a fully immersive theatrical experience. From your speakers, straight into your psyche. Our tales are guaranteed to terrify the bravest of souls (even the dead ones).Currated and written by Trevor and Lauren Shand (...
item.description:
Original scary stories delivered as a fully immersive theatrical experience. From your speakers, straight into your psyche. Our tales are guaranteed to terrify the bravest of souls (even the dead ones).

Curated and written by Trevor and Lauren Shand (Boo Crew Podcast). Krsy Fox (Filmmaker/Musician FRANK, I Live Alone, Knee High Fox) and Spider One (Powerman 5000). Select episodes will feature horror celebrities such as Bonnie Aarons (The Conjuring 2, The Nun), Adam Busch (Buffy The Vampire Slayer) as guest readers. We dare you to listen! **Join our official Patreon and support the show! Get ad-free episodes, shout-outs, and more. Click the link to join https://www.patreon.com/bleedersdiegest To haunt us on social media click here https://linktr.ee/bleedersdiegest



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
